channel.title: windows on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in windows on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-10
item.description: Twitter is launching a Tor service for more secure and private tweeting (3 minute read) Twitter has launched a Tor version of its site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoft’s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-10
item.description: WhatsApp Launches Instant Cryptocurrency Payments in the US (2 minute read) WhatsApp has launched a cryptocurrency payment feature with Novi integration for a limited number of users in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-26
item.description: Adorable redesigned emoji—including Clippy—included in latest Windows 11 update (2 minute read) Microsoft will add redesigned emoji in the next Windows 11 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-25
item.description: Spotify tests a TikTok-like vertical video feed in its app (3 minute read) Spotify is currently testing a new vertical video feed feature called Discover.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-21
item.description: Facebook is planning to rebrand the company with a new name (3 minute read) Facebook is planning to change its company name next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-25
item.description: Microsoft is bringing Android apps to Windows 11 with Amazon’s Appstore (2 minute read) Windows 11 will be able to run Android apps natively.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-16
item.description: Windows 11 leak reveals new UI, Start menu, and more (3 minute read) An early version of Windows 11 has leaked online ahead of its unveiling on June 24.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-18
item.description: Amazon built an Alexa cuckoo clock and wants your help backing new projects like this one (2 minute read) Amazon’s ‘Built It’ program is a Kickstarter-like effort where customers can choose to back a product, and if there is enough support within 30 days, Amazon will build it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-02
item.description: Apple releases Chrome extension for iCloud passwords (1 minute read) Apple has released iCloud Passwords, an official iCloud Keychain Chrome extension for Windows and Mac.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-18
item.description: DuckDuckGo surpasses 100 million daily search queries for the first time (2 minute read) DuckDuckGo recently recorded more than 100 million user search queries in a day.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-23
item.description: Here are Tesla’s biggest announcements from Battery Day (3 minute read) Elon Musk made some big announcements at Tesla’s Battery Day event.
